message.almostTimeRecordAbsolute: Oh, so close! You were just {differenceSec}s off setting a new personal record.
message.almostTimeRecordPercentage: Nearly set a new personal best time! Just {differencePercentage} slower than your best.
message.betterThanAverage: You were {differenceSec}s faster than your average time.
message.firstOfSize: This was the first time you solved a [{dimensions}] puzzle.
message.firstOfSizeDifficulty: A first! You've completed your first [{dimensions}] puzzle on the '@:{difficultyKey}' difficulty level.
message.firstTotal: Fantastic! You've solved your very first puzzle ever!
message.hardestEver: You've just cracked your toughest puzzle ever. Well done!
message.muchBetterThanAverageAbsolute: What an achievement! You were {differenceSec}s faster than your average time.
message.muchBetterThanAveragePercentage: That was way faster than average! You were {improvementPercentage} faster.
message.notAddedToDbCheats: This puzzle wasn't saved to your history because you've cheated.
message.notAddedToDbUnexpected: Uh-oh! This puzzle could not be saved to your history due to an unexpected error.
message.playsConfigToday: Today, you played {count} puzzles of [{dimensions}] size at '@:{difficultyKey}' difficulty.
message.playsConfigTotal: In total, you've solved {count} puzzles of [{dimensions}] size at '@:{difficultyKey}' difficulty.
message.playsTotal: Your total count of solved puzzles now stands at {totalSolved}.
message.replayPlaysTotal: This is the {numPlaysOrdinal} time you've solved this exact puzzle. Your best time was {bestPreviousTimeMinSec}.
message.replayTimeRecord: You've set a new personal best for this exact puzzle! This was the {numPlaysOrdinal} time solving it, and you were {differenceSec}s faster than your previous fastest time.
message.timeRecord: You've improved your best time by {differenceSec}s!
message.timeRecordLarge: Incredible! You were {improvementPercentage} faster than your previous best time!
message.top5Percent: Outstanding! Faster than 95% of your previously solved puzzles.
message.top5Time: Top performance! This attempt ranks in your top {rank} times!
